summary: Who better than Project people, to go to when you need something done!My view of the world is very project centric. Project Portfolio Management, Program Management, Product Management, Process Management, People Management, Performance Management, are all capabilities that increase the effectiveness of an organization.Large organizations may have a whole department committed to each of these disciplines, in smaller organizations, one person does what they can. Large or small, finding the optimal integration of these practices supported by your technology may be more difficult than you think. That's where my partners and I come in. I personally have over 20 years experience across many industries and software applications. I have run hundreds of new change initiatives, using different  software and just processes.
